q: Reagan administration aide who started a campaign to draft Mike Pence for the GOP presidential nomination. Marjorie Dannenfelser , president of the Susan B. Anthony List, a group that opposes abortion, said she trusts that Mike Pence has come to the place that's right for him and his family. `` What I most want is for him to have a long future,'' Marjorie Dannenfelser said.`` So I'm sure that he's made a discernment that this is the right move.

The shakeup calls for co-founder Larry Page to replace CEO Eric Schmidt

in particular, new products.`` We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision-making for a long time,'' Eric Schmidt said in a statement released by Google. By clarifying our individual roles, we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead, and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. Internally, Eric Schmidt , 55, will continue to act as an adviser to Page, 37, and Google co-founder Sergey Brin , also 37, who will also focus on strategic projects and new products. The

The former American Idol judge was asked during a news conference whether viewers would see the`` old Simon Cowell '' or a different side to him when the show premieres on Fox later this year. Look, you adapt over the years, he replied.`` I started to cringe when I started to see people being booked as the so-called mean judge and just being gratuitously rude for the sake of it. I don't like that.
